title: The Perils of Pauline
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Sol Siegal and George Marshall
brief_description: Fabricated biography of silent serial queen, Pearl White. A frantic re-creation of old time Hollywood, with plenty of slapstick chases. Stars Betty Hutton, Billy De Wolfe, William Demarest, Constance Collier and Frank Faylen. Based on the story by P.J. Wolfson, with credit to Charles W. Goddard who wrote the original serial.
